items.title: Pasithea Therapeutics Stock Rockets To Best Day In 4 Years On Massive Share Offering Amid ALS Drug Momentum
items.description: A $1 million ALS Association grant boosted excitement around PAS-004’s first ALS trial.

items.title: ServiceNow Said To Be Closing In On $1B Security Startup Deal — Retail Traders Eye A Lift From 5-For-1 Stock Split
items.description: After striking multiple partnerships this month, ServiceNow could be on the cusp of buying an AI startup.

items.title: Xpeng Stock Rises In Hong Kong On Hybrid Expansion Hints — Europe Could Pit It Against Stellantis’ Lone Chinese EV Backing
items.description: CEO He Xiaopeng signaled XPeng may bring its hybrid models to Europe after extensive X9 testing across the region.
